alert.note: Alert for Colfax; Platte; Stanton (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued April 06 at 3:10PM CDT until April 07 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM CDT THURSDAY... ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM TO 7 PM CDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, northwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. For the Wind Advisory, northwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * WHERE...Stanton, Platte and Colfax Counties. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, from 7 AM to 7 PM CDT Thursday. For the Wind Advisory, until 7 AM CDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
